title: Weird Censoring in runes/masteries
body:
Just recently something changed where the masteries/runes are now censored (something that is only visible to YOU), and I would also like to add that I have the profanity filter off.... 

However, if that wasn't already bad enough, the words that are banned are just ridiculous... Soraka shows as So***a and the entire word "support" is censored for some reason. What's odd is that these are actually in my current masteries, but if I edit them at all, it now censors them.

What is this and why is this in place?

replies.body: Wow that's pretty strange. I don't believe mastery page names are meant to be filtered out. I did receive word that some of the language filters have been updated, and that may have caused the filtering to bleed over into masteries for some strange reason. I can pass this along for you, but also go ahead and post this over in [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) in order to draw the devs attention a little more!

>I don't believe mastery page names are meant to be filtered out.

You may start believing it is a thing.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/TlVGM8Vm-yo-riot-enough-with-the-mastery-censoring

Same with profile status messages.
F.ex. when I wanted to have "DT Lulu recall plz" (as reference to Dragon Trainer Lulu's lack of a recall animation, despite being a 1350 RP skin), the system singled out "DT" as offensive for some reason. RIP context.

I don't need a profanity filter - as a mature adult (unless this game is "PG-32"-rated), I can take it. 
Just add a disable option on the filter, you know. Leave it on by default, but let the grown-ups decide for themselves.
This happened to me too. The "Cai" in Caitlyn is censored so it looks like ***tlyn.
